name: Rubicon Technology, Inc.
description: Rubicon Technology, Inc. is a leading provider of advanced materials and services for the optical and semiconductor industries, specializing in the production of high-quality sapphire products. Founded in 2007 and headquartered in Bensenville, Illinois, Rubicon has established itself as a key player in the market for synthetic sapphire, which is used in a variety of applications including LED lighting, mobile devices, and high-performance optics. The company's proprietary technology allows for the growth of large-diameter sapphire crystals, which can be processed into substrates for LEDs and other electronic components. Rubicon's commitment to innovation and quality has enabled it to serve a global customer base while continuously expanding its product offerings. In addition to sapphire substrates, Rubicon also provides various optical components and services, catering to industries such as telecommunications, consumer electronics, and industrial manufacturing. The company aims to leverage its expertise in materials science to drive advancements in technology and support the growing demand for high-performance materials across diverse sectors.
